msbt.message: Whoa, is that really you? ?Ha HA! How long has it been, <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" />? Wow, time flies.You wouldn't believe the changes we've seen around here. LikeI thought about getting a new haircut. Alright, I guess things are pretty much as you left them. Welcome back, !

Yo, ! Is that really you? Where have you been all this time?! Has it really been <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" /> and <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />? That's wild.So what's new with you? My latest thing is I'm experimenting with fusion cuisine. Like, how does it sound to mix with ? Good, right?
Ahhh! It's the ghost of !Ha HA! I'm just messing with you. You've been gone for so long!Uh, but seriouslyyou're not an actual ghost, right?
What?! Is it really you? After all this timeI was so worried! You just left without even saying goodbye.Well, I guess that's ancient history now. I'm just glad you made it back, .

Yo, where have you BEEN for the past <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />?!TELL me you weren't planning a new start-up without me. What did I say? Always come to me first! Ah, I'll forgive you for a cut of the profits. Welcome back to !

Whoadid I eat some bad or is that in the flesh? IT IS! Welcome home! When did you get back?I can't believe it's been <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />. , even saying that out loud is freaking me out. Oof. Maybe the was bad AND you came back on the same day

Oh! It's ! I can't believe you're back!I didn't know what to do with myself while you were gone.I took up , and for a while there, I was the very best on . Ah, but then fell out of fashion and everyone stopped doing it. Boy, did I waste a lot of time! Anyway, welcome back.

Heyyyy, right? Yo, it's been forever and a day since we've talked, hasn't it? Like, <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" /> or something. Wow.Well, better late than never when it comes to the Light Rail, . Choo-choo! Wait, what noise does a light rail make?

Hey, we finally meet again! I feel like I've been waiting in line for months.I guess we're just both busy, living separate lives here on
Well, you can have your folks call my folks whenever they want. I'll clear the calendar for you!

So, the famous has finally decided to grace me with an appearance! I'm just messing with you. I know how it is when you're the talk of the whole island. Us VIPs have to stick together. Don't be a stranger, .
